actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A bill to establish the Allen J. Ellender Memorial Library.

summary.text: Authorizes construction of the Allen J. Ellender Memorial Libray in Thibodaux, Louisiana. Provides that the Library shall be available for the purposes of housing the personal papers of Allen J. Ellender, supporting research connected with his congressional career and that of his contemporaries in Congress, and promoting related scholarly purposes. Authorizes necessary appropriations to carry out the provisons of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to establish the Allen J. Ellender Memorial Library.
